mapper.insert: insert into alarm_record (alarm_id, vehicle_id, alarm_reason, create_time, `type`) values (#{alarmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehicleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select alarm_id, vehicle_id, alarm_reason, create_time, `type` from alarm_record
